analytic.title: Jesus Within Third- and Fourth-Century Judaism: The Pseudo-Clementine Recognitions 1.27–71 and the Homilies

monogr.title: Within Judaism? Interpretive Trajectories in Judaism, Christianity, and Islam from the First to the Twenty-First Century

body.bibl: Zetterholm, Karin Hedner. “Jesus Within Third- and Fourth-Century Judaism: The Pseudo-Clementine Recognitions 1.27–71 and the Homilies.” In Within Judaism? Interpretive Trajectories in Judaism, Christianity, and Islam from the First to the Twenty-First Century, edited by Karin Hedner Zetterholm and Anders Runesson, 213–28. Lanham, Maryland: Lexington Books, 2024.

Karin Hedner Zetterholm, Jesus Within Third- and Fourth-Century Judaism: The Pseudo-Clementine Recognitions 1.27–71 and the Homilies, in Within Judaism?
